Metadata.Description: The Email Validation Rule ensures that email addresses are syntactically correct, trimmed, and domain-normalized. It checks for a single @, valid local part, and a proper domain with a top-level extension.
Metadata.Author: Export

Rules.Name: Email Validation
Rules.Description: The Email Validation Rule ensures that email addresses are syntactically correct, trimmed, and domain-normalized. It checks for a single @, valid local part, and a proper domain with a top-level extension.
